flawed_nl_solution:
If Charley bought 30 pencils and lost 6 while moving, she remained with 30-6=<<30-6=24>>24 pencils.
Because she isn't good at keeping track of her pencils, Charley lost 1/3*24 = <<1/3*24=72/1>>72/1 more pencils.
She currently has 24-72/1 = <<24-72/1=-48>>-48 pencils.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 72/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
